source_sentence: In 1972, Central Pacific Minerals NL defined historical "Inferred Reserve" estimates of 254,600 short tons @ 37.4% CaF2 with average width of 3m, total length of reef of 870m, depth of 30m and 10% CaF2 cut-off.
resource_context: Historical Inferred Reserve - Sandover Fluorite Project (not JORC compliant)
